title: 1.12.2MOD服 还没来得及装sponge
author: 烟雨郎君
txt_content:
只上传了world主城文件夹

后台却刷了三四条警告 机翻了半天看不懂啥意思- -



09.08 12:10:53 [服务器] 信息 2018-08-09 12:10:53,151 main 警告 停用 terminal, you're 运行 in an unsupported environment.


09.08 12:11:07 [服务器] 服务器线程/警告 [FML]: Missing English translation for FML: assets/fml/lang/en_us.lang


09.08 12:11:08 [服务器] 服务器线程/警告 [net.minecraft.server.dedicated.DedicatedServer]: **** SERVER IS RUNNING IN OFFLINE/INSECURE MODE!09.08 12:11:08 [服务器] 服务器线程/警告 [net.minecraft.server.dedicated.DedicatedServer]: The server will make no attempt to authenticate usernames. Beware.09.08 12:11:08 [服务器] 服务器线程/警告 [net.minecraft.server.dedicated.DedicatedServer]: While this makes the game possible to play without internet access, it also opens up the ability for hackers to connect with any username they choose.09.08 12:11:08 [服务器] 服务器线程/警告 [net.minecraft.server.dedicated.DedicatedServer]: To change this, set "online-mode" to "true" in the server.properties file.








（虽然不影响开服 但是很烦啊）

replies.author: 虚之结社
replies.txt_content:
这个不是很重要的信息只是提醒你正版验证
server.properties中的online-mode

replies.author: 1a2s3d4f1
replies.txt_content: 提醒你打开正版验证的报告，打开正版验证就可以了
